Alassane Ouattara 's choice for prime minister, former rebel leader Guillaume Soro said that only armed intervention could avert a return to civil war. A rapid and well-targeted operation would halt the killings and end the chaos, he told the Jeune Afrique news weekly. Despite the calls for Gbagbo to be deposed by force, Alassane Ouattara said he remained willing to set-up a unity government with elements of his rival's camp.
